select id , commodity_name as name FROM sales_commodity where deleted = 0
AND commodity_name like CONCAT('%',#{salesName},'%')

SELECT sc.id, sc.commodity_code, sc.article_no, sc.commodity_bar_code, sc.commodity_name, sc.type, sc.sort, sc.key_word, sc.manufacturer, sc.batch, sc.available_num, sc.provider_name, sc.provider_id, sc.old_provider_id, sc.spec_num, sc.lable_ids, sc.warn_stock_num, sc.weight_unit, sc.package_unit, sc.commodity_category_id, sc.manufacturer_name, sc.wholesale_price, sc.retail_price, sc.stock_num, sc.sale_state, sc.introduction, sc.trace_status, sc.plant_id, sc.commodity_plant_id, sc.sell_type, sc.add_type, sc.address, sc.num, sc.sync_status, sc.arrive_date, sc.commodity_type, sc.commodity_img, sc.publicity_price, sc.production_address, sc.origin_place, sc.ant_name, sc.create_id, sc.video_url, sc.expert_advice, sc.STATUS, sc.tenant_id, sc.remark, sc.create_time, sc.update_time, sc.creator, sc.updater, sc.deleted, scc.commodity_category_name FROM sales_commodity sc LEFT JOIN sales_commodity_category scc ON sc.commodity_category_id = scc.id WHERE sc.id = #{id} AND sc.deleted = 0
